name: 99 Waves to Die
description: 99 Waves to Die is a twin stick arcade shooter, inspired by the arcade games, and 8-bit home consoles & computers of the 1980's.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Later Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 - Nvidia / ATI / Integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Hard decision... I really like twin stick shooters but this one is way too shallow, mediocre players spot the loophole within minutes and it evolves into a game of patience... not a good and demanding game
